message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exclusive product! I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As a valued customer, I'm willing to offer it to you for $800000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure when I'll be able to make it available at this price again.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but I'm looking to pay closer to $700000.  Let's see if we can work something out.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your target price, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $750000. This is my final counteroffer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
